description: It is a great looking app. A lot of thought and consideration has been put into designing this app, but unfortunately not so much into functionality.
I like the app but the number of bugs is just too high
nice app, latest update to 2.2 fixed theming issues on Fedora and overall app feels more snappier now. still, since upgrade i had 1 crash so I won't give 5 stars. keep up the good work
Fails at step one.
summary: Crashes on first launch when adding a feed

description: It works, does the job, but have some annoying bugs (or missing features?). For example, if you click on the download button that download all episodes the only way to abort is clicking one by one.
If it could minimise to the system tray I'd love it completely. Great UI otherwise though.
summary: Could use a few more features

description: Kubuntu 19.10 here. App is incredibly laggy, jumps up to 25% CPU. Too bad because it seems promising
great design. but very, very, very unstable. works fine with elementaryOS, but not with KDE. shame
App respects my GTK theme, does work well.

Starting it from terminal gives the following error and exits

(com.github.needleandthread.vocal:2): GLib-CRITICAL **: 16:26:21.243: g_strsplit: assertion 'string != NULL' failed

Too bad, I really wanted to try it.

I love the design and UX but man the app is so damn sluggish on a really fast computer and crashes so often, which makes it totally unusable. Sadly. Will keep it installed and hope that these problems get fixed at some point.
Perfect for non-sysadmin or special users. Last star deducted for lack of theme support and inability to apply dark theme. Running on Ubuntu Latest.
App installed fine, but crashed the moment I tried to import feeds via an OPML file.

This app used to be quite functional, and even if it used to crash when adding a podcast you could open it again and the podcast would be there, so it wasn't much of an annoyance. As of recently, it is simply impossible for me to add new podcasts.
summary: Crashes when adding a podcast from iTunes

description: It doesn't run so I don't have words to say that are nice. It didn't run after I installed. bindview45@msn.com
When I selected an Itunes podcast and added it to my subscription, the app closed downd
Ein wirklich gelungenes Programm.
Entweder stürzt die APP beim abonieren ab oder es gibt die Fehlermeldumg raus das etwas mit der Internetverbindung nicht stimmt.

Se ve atractiva, simple y limpia, el diseño me gusta pero por desgracia, en cuanto brujuleas un poco por los distintos podcast a los que puedes suscribirte, se congela y no responde, o de repente responde al cabo de dos minutos, si funcionara con fluidez la daría 5 estrellas, una lástima porque prometía...
не запускается приложение
It has one of the best interface among podcast desktop clients. iTunes and gpodder.net integrations are also what I just need to discover and save pods and sync them across my devices.
